name: Web component
description: A content type that renders an imported web component on the page.

elements.label: Import link
elements.helpText: The import link is the path to the web component HTML file. This can be an internal WCH link, or an external link.

elements.label: Tag name
elements.helpText: The tag name is the HTML tag for the web component to be rendered. This can be found in the web component file.
Add configuration attributes here. Format: name="value"
elements.label: Attributes list
Inner text
elements.helpText: This is the text that goes in between  the web component tags
